name: Darkroom Escape
description:
Welcome to my studio. Don't worry, I won't keep you in the dark for long. We're going to play a little game. If you lose, you die. If you win, well… that’s doubtful.

NOTE: This is a very early build that will be greatly expanded upon later. The next build will allow spectators to help the VR player navigate trap-filled environments (with the help of separate night vision cameras they alone have access to).

Built in one weekend and presented at the VR Austin Jam Showcase.
